attributes.action: Give equal rights to parents in the family court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days of equality for women isn't it about time that the family courts gave equality for men. Each case should be treated on its own merits and both parents start with a 50/50 chance of success instead of the courts automatically favouring the mother.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
